bike.description: Pat Laughlin Signature Model, 100% Cr-Mo, Integrated Head Tube, Integrated Seat Clamp, Mid-BB, Removable Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo, Tapered Legs, 3/8" Dropouts w/ 32mm Offset
3-pc Cr-Mo, 175mm, Closed-End Invisibolt, Mid-Sealed Bearing, 25T SE Bubble Sprocket
SE Alloy 36H 3/8" F & 14mm Semi-Sealed R Hubs w/ Double-wall Rims, 9T Driver
Kenda Ticket 20" x 2.25" F, Kenda Keyboard 20" x 2.10" R
SE Top-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
SE DSP Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
Lightweight SE Seat/Post Combo w/ Padding
